catalog.name: NMC Global Tropospheric Analyses, CDROM subset, daily January to June 1991

dataset.name: NMC Global Tropospheric Analyses, CDROM subset, daily January to June 1991

documentation.xlink:title: NCAR GDEX - NMC Global Tropospheric Analyses, CDROM subset, daily January to June 1991(d082005)

metadata.documentation: NCEP Global Analyses on 145 by 37 2.5 degree grids, one for each hemisphere. Has surface, tropospheric, tropopause, and lower stratospheric analyses; at mandatory levels up to 50 millibars. More... This is a subset of the data in DS082.0.and is identical except that it is in GRIB format on CDROM in. Every CDROM contains six months of data.
